upgrades.name: Axe
upgrades.definition:
If the attack uses a focus, add +1 dice.
          1 success: 1 wound
          3 successes: 2 wounds

upgrades.name: Battle Axe
upgrades.definition:
If the attack was made immediately after a move action, the target cannot roll more than 2 dice during their defence test.
          1 success: 1 wound
          2 successes: 2 wounds
          4 successes: 3 wounds

upgrades.name: Staff of Avion
upgrades.definition:
If the attack uses a focus, add +3 dice.
          Cannot roll more than 6 dice. 
          1 success: 1 wound
          3 successes: 2 wounds

upgrades.name: Havoc Staff
upgrades.definition: Each time an ally receives at least 1 wound, Skeletor gains 1 mana.

upgrades.name: Sword of Power
upgrades.definition:
Before attacking, spend up to 3 mana to gain 1 dice per mana spent.
          1 success: 1 wound
          3 successes: 2 wounds
          5 successes: 3 wounds

upgrades.name: Dagger
upgrades.definition:
This does not use a melee weapon slot. Attacks with this weapon cost 1 AP less (to a minimum of 1).
          1 success: 1 wound
          3 successes: 1 wound and 1 wound (if flank attack)

upgrades.name: Terror Claws
upgrades.definition:
During interruptions, attacks with this weapon cost 1 AP less (to a minimum of 0).
          1 success: 1 wound
          2 successes: 1 wounds and a knockdown
          4 successes: 2 wounds and a knockdown

upgrades.name: Trident
upgrades.definition:
If the target is in difficult terrain, gain +1 die.
          1 success: 1 wound
          2 successes: 2 wounds
          4 successes: 3 wounds

upgrades.name: Sword of Rakash
upgrades.definition:
All melee, spells, and ranged attacks of this character gain 1 free reroll for each character with a Debuff (to maximum of 3).
          1 success: 1 wound
          2 successes: 2 wounds
          5 successes: 3 wounds

upgrades.name: Electronic Sword of Power
upgrades.definition:
The target must choose to either only roll a number of dice equal to their mana for their defence test, or roll dice normally but only succeed on results of 6.
          1 success: 1 wound
          3 successes: 2 wounds
          5 successes: 3 wounds

upgrades.name: Flying Fists
upgrades.definition:
If the attack knocks out the target, this character can perform a free move action.
          1 success: 1 wound
          2 successes: 1 wound and this character gains a Focus
          3 successes: 2 wounds and this character gains a Focus

upgrades.name: Longsword
upgrades.definition:
If the target has a debuff, gain +1 die.
          1 success: 1 wound
          3 successes: 2 wounds
          5 successes: 2 wounds and 1 wound (if the target has a debuff)

upgrades.name: Hook Attachment
upgrades.definition:
Trap Jaw must equip this weapon.
          This does not use a melee weapon slot.
          1 success: 1 wound
          3 successes: 2 wounds

upgrades.name: Laser Attachment
upgrades.definition:
This does not use a ranged weapon slot.
          Before attacking, Trap Jaw may spend either 1 extra AP to gain one of the bonuse below or 2 extra AP to gain both bonuses:
          +2 dice or increase range by 4"
          1 success: 1 wound
          3 successes: 2 wounds
          5 successes: 3 wounds

upgrades.name: Purple Sword of Power
upgrades.definition:
When this character has a focus, add +1 die to spell and skill tests.
          1 success: 1 wound
          2 successes: 1 wound and this character gains 2 mana
          3 successes: 2 wounds and this character gains 2 mana

upgrades.name: Mace
upgrades.definition:
When this character has a focus, add +1 die to all defence tests.
          1 success: 1 wound
          2 successes: 1 wound and push target 2 hexes
          3 success: 2 wounds and push target 2 hexes

upgrades.name: Arm Cannon
upgrades.definition:
This does not use a ranged weapon slot. Attacks with this weapon cost 1 AP less (to a minimum of 1) and do not receive a penalty to the scope during interruption.
          1 success: 1 wound
          4 successes: 2 wounds

upgrades.name: Fear Gas Cannon
upgrades.definition:
Gain 1 die for each character with a debuff (to a maximum of 3).
          1 success: 1 wound
          2 successes: 1 wound and a cripple
          3 successes: 2 wounds and a cripple

upgrades.name: Flamethrower
upgrades.definition:
This weapon affects the target and all characters within 2 hexes from them. Targets' defence tests only succeed on results of 6.
          2 successes: 1 wound
          3 successes: 2 wounds

upgrades.name: Blaster
upgrades.definition:
Once per every activation or interruption, if this character has made a ranged attack using a focus, this character can immediately perform a free ranged attack with the blaster.
          2 successes: 1 wound
          3 successes: 2 wounds

upgrades.name: Horde Crossbow
upgrades.definition:
The target cannot roll more than 2 dice during their defence test
          1 success: 1 wound
          2 successes: 1 wound and push target 2 hexes

upgrades.name: Laser Pistol
upgrades.definition:
This does not use a ranged weapon slot. Attacks with this weapon cost 1 AP less (to a minimum of 1).
          1 success: 1 wound
          2 successes: 1 wound and a Blind

upgrades.name: Laser Rifle
upgrades.definition:
If the attack uses a focus, add +3 dice. Cannot roll more than 6 dice.
          1 success: 1 wound
          4 successes: 2 wounds

upgrades.name: Photon Neutralizer
upgrades.definition:
If an interruption attack with this weapon results in 2 or more successes, gain an Overwatch.
          1 success: 1 wound
          2 successes: 1 wound and target loses 2 mana.
          4 successes: 2 wounds and target loses 2 mana.

upgrades.name: Cosmic Storm
upgrades.definition:
Instead of resolving the most expensive effect, choose any effect based on the number of successes rolled.
          1 success: Orko gains 2 mana
          2 successes: 1 wound
          3 successes: Teleport target 3 hexes

upgrades.name: Cosmic Storm
upgrades.definition:
This does not use a spell slot. This spell can be used while engaged. Attacks with this spell cost 1 AP less (to a minimum of 1).
          1 success: Push target 2 hexes
          2 successes: 1 wound and push target 2 hexes

upgrades.name: Fireball
upgrades.definition:
This spell affects the target and all characters within 1 hex from them.
          Before attacking, spend 2 additional Mana to increase this radius by 1 hex per Mana spent.
          2 successes: 1 wound
          3 successes: 2 wounds
          6 successes: 3 wounds

upgrades.name: Eternal Binds
upgrades.definition:
If target has a debuff, gain 1 die.
          1 success: Target loses 2 mana
          2 successes: Target loses 2 mana and gains a Knockdown

upgrades.name: Magic Blast
upgrades.definition:
If the target has less mana than the attacker (after mana is spent for the spell), gain +2 dice.
          2 successes: 1 wound
          3 successes: 2 wounds
          5 successes: 3 wounds

upgrades.name: Spell of Protection
upgrades.definition:
This spell targets allies instead of enemies. The target does not make a defence test.
          Attacks with this spell cost 1 AP less (to a minimum of 1).
          1 success: Protection

upgrades.name: Thunder
upgrades.definition:
During interruptions, attacks with this spell cost 1 AP less (to a minimum of 1).
          1 success: 1 wound
          2 successes: 1 wound and a Blind
          3 successes: 2 wounds and a Blind

upgrades.name: Flaming Missile
upgrades.definition:
When this character has a focus, the mana cost is reduced to 0.
          1 success: 1 wound
          3 successes: 2 wounds

upgrades.name: Shadow Strike
upgrades.definition:
Before attacking, spend up to 3 mana to gain 1 die per mana spent.
          1 success: 1 wound
          3 successes: 2 wounds
          5 successes: 3 wounds

upgrades.name: Battle Armor I
upgrades.definition: Once per round, when receiving at least 1 Wound, the character may spend 2 Mana to reduce the number of Wounds by 1.

upgrades.name: Battle Harness
upgrades.definition: +1 Toughness

upgrades.name: Gear Tech Vest
upgrades.definition: +1 Mind

upgrades.name: Helm
upgrades.definition: At the end of an interruption, gain a focus.

upgrades.name: Magic Cloak
upgrades.definition: The character can have an additional spell weapon.

upgrades.name: Weapon Holster
upgrades.definition: The character can have an additional trinket weapon.

upgrades.name: Flaming Shield
upgrades.definition: When the character has a Focus, gain +1 to the scope of defence tests against all frontal attacks.

upgrades.name: Shield of Ka
upgrades.definition: If the character is a target of a frontal attack at a distance of 6" or farther, gain +1 to the scope of that defence test.

upgrades.name: Amulet of Avarice
upgrades.definition: If there are no enemies within 6": +1 Power Otherwise: -1 Power

upgrades.name: Gem of Magoo
upgrades.definition: Power Gain. Choose an ally within 12". The chosen ally gains a Focus.

upgrades.name: Jet Pack
upgrades.definition: Long Jump. The character can jump up to their Speed value -1.

upgrades.name: Golden Disk of Knowledge
upgrades.definition: The character skill tests gain +1 Die.

upgrades.name: Magic Feather
upgrades.definition: Cleansing. Test Power. 1 Success: Choose an ongoing effect within 8". Remove it.

upgrades.name: Horn of Evil
upgrades.definition: Ancient Magic. Choose an ongoing effect within 16", it is not removed during the next clean up phase.

upgrades.name: Magic Potion
upgrades.definition: Disposable. Gain 2 Mana.

upgrades.name: Orb of Power
upgrades.definition: Upon activation, gain 2 Mana.

upgrades.name: Polarizer
upgrades.definition:
When the character has a Focus: +1 Perception.
          Otherwise: -1 Perception

upgrades.name: Wheel of Infinity
upgrades.definition: At the end of the activation or interruption, if the character performed no attacks, they gain an Overwatch.

upgrades.name: Ram Stone
upgrades.definition: Any Melee attack made immediately after a move action, gain +1 Die.

upgrades.name: Grayskull Ring
upgrades.definition: If the character's attack results in 3 or more Successes, gain a Focus.

upgrades.name: Spellstone
upgrades.definition: If the character's attack results in 2 or more Successes, gain 1 Mana.

upgrades.name: Sun Scarab
upgrades.definition: All attacks against enemies with a Debuff, gain +1 Die.

upgrades.name: Ambrosia
upgrades.definition:
Disposable.
          Gain 1 Action.

upgrades.name: Gem of Tamadge
upgrades.definition: All interruption attacks gain +1 die.

skills.name: I Have the Power!
skills.definition: During any test, He-Man may reroll 1 extra (die) for each (mana token) spent on rerolls.

skills.name: Superhuman Reflex
skills.definition: He-Man cannot receive (mana token) from fate and glory cards. If he gains a (focus token), he also gainst 1 (mana token).

skills.name: Shared Power
skills.definition: Any Ally within 8" can spend Evil-Lyn's mana as their own.

skills.name: Dark Presence
skills.definition:
Test (power) against the (mind) of an enemy within 16".
            1 (success): (blind debuff token).

skills.name: Summon
skills.definition:
Test (power) -2.
            1 (success): Choose an ally within 12". and teleport the ally to a hex adjacent to Skeletor.

skills.name: Lord of Destruction
skills.definition: Until the end of the current activation or interruption, Skeletor can use (spell) while engaged.

skills.name: Always Vigilant
skills.definition: At the end of the activation, if there are no enemies within 8", gain an (overwatch token).

skills.name: Master Tactician
skills.definition:
Test (power) +1.
            1 (success): The next ally activated this round gains 2 (mana token).
            This ability cannot be used during an interruption.

skills.name: To the Sky!
skills.definition: If Stratos isnt' engaged, spend up to 5 (mana token) to jump 1 hex for every (mana token) spent.

skills.name: Leader of Avion
skills.definition:
Test (power). 1 (success): Choose any activated ally (line of sight not required).
            This ally gains a (focus token) or an (overwatch token).
            This ability cannot be used during an interruption.

skills.name: Magic Hat
skills.definition:
Orko starts the game with 3 (mana token).
            Before Orko or ally within 8" makes a defence test, Orko may spend up to 3 (mana token) and add to this test 1 extra (die) per (mana token) spent.

skills.name: Traveller from Trolla
skills.definition:
After spending (mana token) and (action) for (spell), but before making an attack test, Orko has to make a (mind) +1 test.
            If he does not roll at least 2 (success), his spell has no effect.

skills.name: Ramming Speed
skills.definition:
Ram Man makes a free move action with his (speed) value +2 (to a maximum of 6). Test (strenth) against (toughness) of each enemy within 2 hexes.
            1 (success): (Knockdown debuff token)

skills.name: Human Battering Ram
skills.definition: If Ram Man ends his activation engaged, he gains a (focus token).

skills.name: Instant Puddle
skills.definition:
Test (power).
            1 (success): Place a (Mer-Man mark token) within 8". The area within 2 hexes from a (Mer-Man mark token) is treated as difficult terrain.

skills.name: Freezing Ray
skills.definition:
Test (power) +1 against the (mind) of an enemy within 12".
            1 (success): (cripple debuff token).

skills.name: Gammavision
skills.definition:
Test (power) +2 against the (mind) of an enemy within 12".
            1 (success): (Tri-Klops mark token), all attacks against a character with a (Tri-Klops mark token) gain a (focus token).

skills.name: Optic Blast!
skills.definition:
If an enemy within 8" receives a (Debuff token), Tri-Klops can spend 1 to 3 (mana token) and test (power) (+1 Die per (mana token) spent) against the (mind) of this enemy.
            1 (success): 1 (wound token).

skills.name: Weapon Swap
skills.definition:
If Trap Jaw has the 'Hook Attachment' equipped, replace it with the 'Laser Attachment'.
            If Trap Jaw has the 'Laser Attachment' equipped, replace it with the 'Hook Attachment'.

skills.name: Grappling Hook
skills.definition:
If Trap Jaw has the 'Hook Attachment' equipped, test (perception) -1.
            Trap Jaw can jump in a straigth line up to 2 hexes per (success).
